solution_line_template: If 1 bag has {cookies_per_bag} cookies and a box has {bags_per_box} bags, then in total there are {cookies_per_bag}*{bags_per_box}=<<{cookies_per_bag}*{bags_per_box}={total_cookies_in_box}>>{total_cookies_in_box} cookies inside the box

If 1 cookie has {calories_per_cookie} calories and there are {total_cookies_in_box} cookies in the box, then the box has in total {calories_per_cookie}*{total_cookies_in_box}=<<{calories_per_cookie}*{total_cookies_in_box}={total_calories_in_box}>>{total_calories_in_box} calories
